DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine best format deliver brief behavioral weight loss intervention young adult 18-25 year age .
DOC.criteria: 1825 year old body mass index 2545 willing randomly assign 3 arm available time frame study willing complete assessment visit 0 , 2 , 4 6 month Age BMI outside eligible range Medical condition would interfere weight loss make unsupervised physical activity unsafe Pregnant nursing within 6 month recent weight loss > 10 % body weight History eat disorder Substance abuse dependence
